title: Himi 209
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e kau noa masiva,
‘A kitautolu fulipē
Ko e ha nai te tau ‘atu,
Ki hotau ‘Otua lelei?
2.
’Oku mau loto feinga,
Ke mau fakaongo atu,
‘A hono huafa lahi,
Pea fakaongo lelei.
3.
Ko e tupu’anga koe,
‘O e ‘ofa angatonu,
Fakafonu homau loto,
‘I he ‘ofa tupu fo’ou.
4.
Pea ‘e fakahā atu,
‘E he’emau mo’ui
‘A e māfimafi ‘o’ou,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.
5.
Ke ‘oua ke ‘ilo koe,
‘E māmani kotoa pē,
Pea mau ngutu taha
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona.
6.
Ke ke to’o ‘a e matapa,
‘E ‘ikai fa’a tāpuni
‘E māmani, pe ko heli,
Ka ‘oku na feinga ki ai.
7.
Ke ‘iate kimautolu
‘Eiki, ‘a ho’o folofola
Pea lahi, pea fua,
Pea tu’uma’u ai pē ia.
8.
Ke ke fakalahi ‘a e,
Tenga ‘a e kau lulu’i,
Ko ia te mau fua ai,
‘I he houa kotoa pe. *
